div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1194 Vourla? (now Urla; anc. Clazome- (255) nae), Ionia, 1875 Burial: c. 410-400 B.C. (Regling) Contents: 90 EL, AV Cyzicus: 70 EL st. Lampsacus: 20 EL st. Persia: "several" darics Disposition: dispersed. Sotheby, Feb. 13, 1878, nos. 212-23 â€ Head, NC 1876, pp. 277-98, illus.; 1877, pp. 169-76, illus. Greenwell, NC 1887, pp. 41-2 Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 25
